channel.title: Diablo II?
channel.description: Anyone else play this :D? Old but pretty fun game.. and what do you guys think of diablo III?

item.title: Diablo II?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Actually, I like that kind of hack and slash games. You just click and the character attacks.
My favourite character was the barbarian, although I haven’t played for so long I forgot everything.
I used to have the original CD Disk but it’s screwed now and I can’t play it anymore… and for some reason the 3 pirated versions I downloaded had viruses on them and didn’t work anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo II?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I didn’t find the game appealing at all. And some friends said it was bad, so I didn’t bother with the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo II?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:375531”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=471475.msg3448941#msg3448941 date=1293603676]
Dangit, I just nostalgiagasm’d all over my computer -.-
[/quote] oh man
I was opening a coke, right
–> Beefpile (~mbeefpile@cloaked.wi.rr.com) has joined #themacmind
and it exploded
ALMOST all over my keyboard
but I got it away just in time
<-- Beefpile has quit (sick fuckers)
:<[/quote]Bash is great, right?

I haven’t played Diablo II, but it’s by Blizzard so I can only assume it’s like every other game they’ve made.
